comments.content:
Hi Ritva,  
welcome to Typophile!

That’s probably based on [Linotext](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414211529/http:/www.linotype.com/948/linotext-family.html) aka Wedding Text or Mariage.  
Please post such requests on the Type ID Board: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414211529/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
And: [Please use a descriptive title next time! Thank you.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414211529/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")  
F
